Opening an Online bookmaker account

You have now made your Cheltenham Gold Cup selection or which to back our Cheltenham Gold Cup tips and then all you need to do is decide the online bookmaker which either offers the best price about your selection or best suits your betting requirements or even offers the best Cheltenham Gold Cup free bet, and then all that's left to do is open the account.

Simply click on any of the links on this site for the bookmaker you have chosen and this will take you directly to that online bookmaker and from there you see the open an account button which you click on and go through the simply registration process.

Claim a free bet of £100 For the 2010 Cheltenham Gold Cup with Paddy Power

Registering with an online bookmaker is a very straightforward process and only takes a few minutes. You will be asked for some personal information such as name, age, address and a few other very simple questions for your account security. Once this is complete you will asked to lodge some funds to place your Cheltenham Gold Cup Free Bet and this can be done with either your Debit or Credit Cards.

Should your selection become one of the Cheltenham Gold Cup Winners you can then have your winnings sent straight back to the bank card you used when lodging your funds.
